website_summaries.verdict: Full set includes ring and resistance bands for a total body workout.
pros: Ideal set for beginners, especially since it comes with an activity guide
Solid construction with fiberglass ring and soft, foam-wrapped grips
cons: Decent option for home practice, but some quality concerns given the clicking sound during use

customer_reviews.title: For home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Nice it came with a bag with drawstrings. Has a elastic band that is great for many exercises. The ring is so flexible, goes right back to original shape while using. Comes with grips that are very comfortable on the hands or legs. Has exercise diagram to help with exercises. Really has helped me with the strengthening of my legs, my muscles are longer tight
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Definetely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Pilates Rings and bands through a workout class at my dance studio this year, and asked for this product for a Christmas present. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to do at-home workouts or if you want to gain muscle without using weights. Both the Pilates circle and bands are great quality and you can use them for arm, ab, and leg workouts. I also love how you get the light, medium, heavy, and extra heavy bands with this one product. Super happy that I got these!
customer_reviews.author: IamSAW

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ring. Ended up buying another. Our old one wore out after years. This one is very stiff. There is no pliability and impossible to exercise with as it is solid. That is not how a pilates ring should be. It should be flexible enough to push in, yet have enough resistance to provide a workout. This does not. It is immovable. Only reason for the one is because the bands have a carry case which is helpful. Though I had to buy another set of bands when the lightest one broke after one rep during daughter’s physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: brinicky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at-home shelter-in-place exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to supplement my exercise routine while we shelter in place. I was looking for the Pilates ring and loved that this one came with booty bands. Perfect combo that I use with The Live Fit Girls' videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s good
customer_reviews.text: I overall like this, but my ring arrived a little dented and clicks when I squeeze it. I think it’s just rubbing. Anyway, I think it’s good overall and will suit what I’m using it for. The resistance bands I’m not a fan of because they roll and are a little small. For the price the kit is good, but I could see some improvements. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: ElleRey

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Ring Fit Adventure and have been playing it while my 3 year old watches. She always wanted to play with me with the ring. I purchased this for her to use and play along with me. She is very happy having her own ring and it is in her favorite bright blue color. She is able to compress the ring slightly but it is definitely designed for users with a bit more strength than a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Lezama Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to use at my desk while I'm working. It's sturdy and the handles on both sides are helpful. I have not tried the bands yet, but they look good. Everything fits in the bag that was included.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Q.

customer_reviews.title: I feel good
customer_reviews.text: After receiving it, I feel very pleasantly surprised. The appearance is beautiful and the quality is very good. After experiencing it, I feel good. If I insist on using it, my skin will become thinner and firmer. The product is as described by the seller and looks very high-end。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Received item earlier this month. So far seems okay. I take to a core cardio class.
customer_reviews.author: jcf123

customer_reviews.title: Received as shown
customer_reviews.text: The ring and latex bands were exactly as pictured. The information provided with instructions for use were not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pilates circle in 13 years. My 10 year old awesome heavy duty circle broke. This circle appears just as strong and the bands are a good quality. I knew I could return it, if I wasn't satisfied. However, this company offers an 18 month return policy of its' own. That speaks volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a thigh workout but I can see immediately all the workouts that can be achieved with it. I don't necessorily need bands, so I went for the single ring. Great price with brief workout guide, it’s the best I have ever used so far
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W Dennison

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It has been a long time since I received the goods. I have been busy with my work. Now I am free to comment.The packaging is very good, so far has not had time to use, such as the weekend must be a good use, exercise.The colors are nice and look very harmonious.Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have also tried URBNFit pilates ring, but feel this one is more comfortable to use. It comes with brief instructions. Quality made and easy to use. Love the black.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and bargain priced. Very useful in recovery exercises before and after knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Len R.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The arrival time is very fast, received very satisfied, the night can't wait to try.This one has a high level of appearance, low profile black, slightly matte feel, not the kind of smooth plastic, is my favorite hand, very strong feeling.I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Seelig

customer_reviews.title: Portable sports equipment
customer_reviews.text: Get the product immediately mobilize the whole family to try, very light sports equipment, very useful. The operation is simple and the quality is very good. After receiving it, I found that it is very elastic. The strength is just good. I am very satisfied. I like it
customer_reviews.author: amber jackson

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much, which is very much in line with my mind. It is a great pleasure to buy such a satisfactory product at this price. I feel very good to wear it on my hand, and the material is very good
customer_reviews.author: Momo87th

customer_reviews.title: I think I'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: I can several things with it but I'm mostly please with the exercise that you squeeze your thighs together with it. I have a nerve problem and strengthening my left side is very important to me. This helps without putting a strain on the rest of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: It is highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am really out of shape. Having osteoporosis I was wanting something to help me with my inner thighs that wasn’t heavy or hard to use. This works well and is very well made. I recommend this for people who are beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, strength can, later will continue to insist, good quality, super quality, and very durable, super easy to use.It is very effective to buy pelvic floor muscle repair.Good quality and cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Steele

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great deal, for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to supplement my Pilates routine, at home. This ring is as nice as the one at my studio. It even came with a drawstring carrying case. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Pham

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this Pilates Ring better than the one at the gym. I have already noticed an increase in strength in my legs. Thank you for making such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yoga and PT!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I use this for yoga, but many strengthening activities that my physical therapist has given me after my back surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I like the products overall am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love these! the bands are strong and the ring is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: yaraliz ramos

customer_reviews.title: very good , the color is exactly  what i want
customer_reviews.text: like the color , and it is the same as pictured. nice
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a part was not on the ring it was stuck to the paper . disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Great way to exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I has really helped me to strengthen my quads and my core.
customer_reviews.author: LWM

customer_reviews.title: Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the ring in my Pilates class and decided I need one at home so both my husband and I can use it. Very nice Pilates ring.
customer_reviews.author: ZKD

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's about 10 days I am using it and I am fully satisfied. I like the fact it gives those sensory ques to the body to maintain body postures while doing exercises. it looks fragile but tuned out sturdy for heavy exercises as well.
customer_reviews.author: Soubir Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Pilates and it seems to work very well. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: j.x.gris

product_meta.title: Anfly Pilates Ring - Pilates Magic Circle 14 inch Dual Soft Grip Handles Strong Fitness Exercise Circle with Brief Workout Guide for Full Body Toning, Yoga and Core Strength Training
product_meta.description:
Warm tips: There are single pilates ring and pilates ring + 4 resistance band set selections in different prices. They may not all be in stock as you sometimes do not see both at the same time 

[SIMPLE BUT EFFECTIVE]

 Anfly pilates ring helps improve your posture and core muscle strength as well as intensifying your pilates exercises. 

It has two handles to be held with both hands for a full upper-body workout, and can be positioned between your thighs for a lower-body workout.

 [A MUST HAVE FOR EVERYONE]

The Pilates method focuses on practicing with awareness and attention to proper from in order to train the body to move with strength, grace and efficiency. 

Whether you are a professional athlete, a dancer, a computer programmer or a house wife, pilates exercises are truly “movement for life.”

 [MULTI-COLORS TO CHOOSE FROM]

Pink - Black - Blue - Purple

 [LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE]

 Measuring 14 inches and weighing less than 1 pound, the pilates ring can be conveniently placed in the trunk or carried around. 

You can always use it at home, bring it to the gym and get started anywhere.

Straps information for reference if you are considering to get the "pilates ring+4 resistance straps set" 

 Red-500*50*0.5mm-LIGHT-10-15lbs 

 Blue-500*50*0.7mm-MEDIUM-13-20lbs 

 Orange-500*50*0.9mm-HEAVY-17-25lbs 

 Black-500*50*1.1mm-X-HEAVY-20-30lbs
feature_bullets: [DOUBLE PILATE EXERCISE ENHANCEMENTS]: Got here and hesitate no more! The pilate ring also comes with 4 stretch straps of different colors & levels of resistance. It makes your feel much more stronger when you have a quick round of body exercise enhancement using the stretch straps when your pilate workout is done

[SHAPE YOUR BODY AS YOU'VE LONG BEEN WANTED]: Perfect versatile pilates exercise ring you can use anywhere. The soft rubber ring provides resistance for faster, more targeted toning, improving muscle strength throughout the body...especially in problem areas like the inner and outer thighs, upper arms,and chest

[STRONGER FIBERGLASSES & SOFT HANDLES]: Tone, strengthen and streamline! the Pilates Circle provides total-body conditioning for men and women. Made of sturdy flexible plastic with a soft, rubberised shell, features added handles on both the inside and the outside of the ring offer superior comfort

[LASTS FOR YEARS TO COME]: These pilates rings keep their shapes well and are built to last for years to come. We all hate to replace broken ones twice or even 3 times in a year. They are made with stronger resistance material for much better performing excericse

[HASSLE FREE PURCHASE]: No worries if the Amazon return windows closed, all exercises balls sold by Anfly are covered by a 18 months product warranty for quality related replacements or refund. Get back to us and we are more than happy to help anytime
